mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.agentid AS "agentid", a.money AS "money", a.num AS "num", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.state AS "state", a.discountid AS "discountid", a.discountmoney AS "discountmoney", a.delivernumber AS "delivernumber", a.courier AS "courier"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_order( id, agentid, money, num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, state, discountid, discountmoney, delivernumber, courier ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{agentid}, #{money}, #{num}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{state}, #{discountid}, #{discountmoney}, #{delivernumber}, #{courier} )
mapper.update: UPDATE a_order SET agentid = #{agentid}, money = #{money}, num = #{num}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, state = #{state}, discountid = #{discountid}, discountmoney = #{discountmoney}, delivernumber = #{delivernumber}, courier = #{courier} WHERE id = #{id}
